title: Love Island's Belle and Anton secretly back together as they join Anna Vakili for date night

Love Island 's Belle Hassan and Anton Danyluk spark suggestions they have secretly rekindled their romance as they enjoyed a cosy date night with Anna Vakili on Monday.

The freelance makeup artist, 21, and gym hunk, 24, ended their relationship at the beginning of last month, just five weeks after experiencing life together outside of the villa.

But now the pair have been snapped cosying up together while joined by their pal Anna at Beirut Nights Lebanese restaurant and bar in London.

Anna, 29, took to her Instagram story to share videos of the blonde beauty and her Scotsman.

In one video, she laughs, "Guess who I'm with..." and turned the camera to Anton before adding: "My favourite boy," as Belle smiles in the background.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Matt Frost/ITV/REX)

Both Belle and Anton didn't seem to mind Anna sharing their reunion as they posted her videos to their Instagram Stories.

When the pair split, her friend and Love Island co-star Lucie Donlan shared actor Tamer Hassan's daughter was "quite down" about the fresh break-up.

The surfer laid out all the intimate details about Belle's heartache following the demise of her romance with Anton.

(Image: Instagram)

Lucie put the end of the romance down to long distance because Belle is based in London while Anton has been travelling a lot with work commitments.

She said: "She's quite down about it to be honest, she did really like him. I'm surprised and gutted that they've ended things. But she's busy and Anton is busy so it must be hard.

(Image: Instagram)

"I think it's so mad when you come out. You just don't expect it.

"Anton is away a lot, Belle is in London, and neither of them have had a long-term relationship before so I think they found that hard."

Mirror Online has contacted reps for Belle and Anton for comment.
description: The blonde beauty and gym hunk have sparked speculation that they are back together after recent split
